resources:
Advising App In order to declare a minor, students should consult their advisor, fill out a minor declaration form and submit it to the department chair. A minor typically requires 16 to 20 credits of course work, with some minors further requiring students to earn a given number of credits through directed research or project-based learning. Minor declaration form can be found here: https://www.wit.edu/sites/default/files/CAS/minor.pdf Students should contact the department offering the class for assistance.
Select Major:
Computer Science
Computer Networking
Computer Engineering
Computer Information Systems
